#3
start <- as.numeric(readline("Enter numbers of terms to print in fibonacci sequence:"))

if (is.na(start)){
cat("Error. Please enter new Number.\n")
}else{
a<-0
b<-1
}

cat ("Fibonacci sequence starts from",start,"\n")
cat(start,"")

repeat {
nextFib <- a+b
  if (nextFib > start){
  break
}
cat(nextFib,"")
a<-b
b<-nextFib
}
cat("\n")
